column1: 1940|twenty to eight|They reckon the time was twenty to eight. They can swear
column3: that the body wasn't suspended then and that they saw no one on the forecourt.

column5: are still eating supper and their parents are not ready to go yet. From other rooms come the sound of a baby screaming
column7: a television musical (no words: probably a dance number - patterns of gliding figures come to mind).
